install.name: S5 Image Slide
S5 Image Slide
install.author: Shape5.com
install.description: This module will display images of any url in a any type of sliding Mootools transitions. You set the slide transition.

param.name: pretext
param.label: Pre-Text
param.description: Enter any pre-text message.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: s5_arrowshide
param.label: Hide/Show Navigation Arrows
param.description: Choose if would like to show or hide the arrows.

param.name: s5_thumbnailhide
param.label: Hide/Show Thumbnails
param.description: Choose if would like to show or hide the thumbnails.

param.name: s5_stopplayhide
param.label: Hide/Show Stop and Play buttons
param.description: Choose if would like to show or hide the stop and play buttons.

param.name: s5_rotate
param.label: Auto Rotate Images
param.description: Choose to auto rotate through images or manually rotate.

param.name: s5_imageslidestyle
param.label: Fader Effect
param.description: Choose the jQuery effect you would like to have between image transitions.

param.name: tween_time
param.label: Tween Time (in seconds)
param.description: The amount of time in seconds an image takes to fade.

param.name: height
param.label: Height
param.description: Enter the height of the image slider.

param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.description: Enter the width of the image slider.

param.name: Note
param.default: You may enter up to 10 images. If you do not wish to use 10 simply leave the extra fields blank. IMPORTANT - Do not leave fields blank between images, ie: If you are only using 4 images then fields for images 1,2,3,4 should be filled in, not images 1,3,5,6 or any other order like it.
param.label: Note:
param.description: You may enter up to 10 images. If you do not wish to use 10 simply leave the extra fields blank. IMPORTANT - Do not leave fields blank between images, ie: If you are only using 4 images then fields for images 1,2,3,4 should be filled in, not images 1,3,5,6 or any other order like it.

param.name: picture1target

param.description: Open hyperlink for image 1 in New Window or same?
